alert.note: Alert for Christian; Daviess; McLean; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:30PM EST until February 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of western Kentucky, including the following counties...Trigg, Christian, Daviess, McLean, Muhlenberg, and Todd. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the this evening`s commute and the morning commute on Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the ice and sleet accumulation should be tonight into early Thursday morning. By mid-morning Thursday, temperatures should rise above freezing and transition the precipitation over to all rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Daviess; McLean; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg
